document_data.name: Pale Mint
document_data.mainbody: '''Pale mint''' was a rare [[herb]] native to the scorched sands of the [[Calim Desert]].
document_data.Description: Pale mint leaves were of light green color. The plant was often called a culinary jewel and rightfully so. When tried and crushed, pale mint gained lemony sweet flavor, popular addition to the most gourmet dishes in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Habitats: Despite being native to the hot nation of [[Calimshan]], pale mint could occasionally be found growing and cultivated in the [[Western Heartlands]] as early as the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
